name: Brick House - Maduro - Mighty Mighty
additionalNotes: Brick House Maduro is cigar that is darker and spicier than its predecessor. An oily Brazilian Arapiraca Maduro wrapper houses a blend of premium Nicaraguan long-fillers and a Nicaraguan binder. The bold, full-bodied flavor profile is punctuated by notes of cocoa and sweetness. Slow-burning, firm in hand, and deliciously tasty, itâ€™s a fitting follow-up that will easily work its way onto your top ten list.
